game.name: The Alien Way
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Casual, Indie, Racing, Simulation
game.shortDescription: The Alien Way is a high-speed platformer made in 2D pixel art.Jump from platform to platform, bypassing saws and the space abyss. Open all skins with unique characteristics and pump them in a special shop in the main menu.
